sentences.sentence: The pro-life movement has right-wingers and left-wingers.
sentences.translation: 反对人工流产运动中有右翼成员也有左翼成员。

sentences.sentence: Across Europe, hard-line right-wingers are gaining power.
sentences.translation: 在整个欧洲，主张强硬路线的右翼分子正在赢得政权。

sentences.sentence: He declared war on the government and urged right-wingers to eliminate their opponents.
sentences.translation: 他向政府宣战并且力劝右翼分子们消灭他们的对手。
